videoSnippet.title: Hikaru and Magnus Reinvent Chess
videoSnippet.description:
Photos by Lennart Ootes https://www.chessphotoshop.com/
Have a great day :)

Hikaru (3228) - MagnusCarlsen (3261) 
Live Chess (Chess.com) [-] A00 2022.10.11
A00 Anderssen's opening

1.a3 g5 2.e4 c5 3.d4 cxd4 4.Qxd4 Nf6 5.Bxg5 Nc6 6.Qd3 Qb6 7.Bc1 Ng4 8.Nh3 d6 9.Nc3 Nge5 10.Qb5 Qxb5 11.Bxb5 Bxh3 12.gxh3 a6 13.Be2 Nd4 14.Kd1 Nxe2 15.Nxe2 Rc8 16.b3 Rg8 17.Be3 b5 18.a4 b4 19.a5 e6 20.Ra2 Be7 21.Ng3 Kd7 22.Ke2 Bd8 23.Rd1 Rb8 24.f4 Nc6 25.Bc5 Bc7 26.Bxd6 Bxd6 27.e5 Kc7 28.exd6+ Kd7 29.Ne4 Rg2+ 30.Kf3 Rxh2 31.Nc5+ Ke8 32.Rg1

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:32 Game Starts!
01:00 Completely New Game!
06:52 Pause the Video!
07:36 It was in this position!
09:40 Contributions!

The 2022 U.S. Championship is a 14-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $262,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com
